platform.summary: a Galaxy dedicated for the Street Science Community
comments: In the [Street Science community](https://streetscience.community/), we want to make science tangible & accessible by bringing it to the “street” via open science workshops.
The public server is hosted by the UseGalaxy.eu team.
sponsors: The [Freiburg Galaxy Team](https://usegalaxy-eu.github.io/freiburg/) but also collectively by groups and individuals from across Europe
